      • publish

        public void publish(ClusterChangedEvent clusterChangedEvent,
                    Discovery.AckListener ackListener)
        Description copied from interface: Discovery
        Publish all the changes to the cluster from the master (can be called just by the master). The publish process should not publish this state to the master as well! (the master is sending it...). The Discovery.AckListener allows to keep track of the ack received from nodes, and verify whether they updated their own cluster state or not. The method is guaranteed to throw a Discovery.FailedToCommitClusterStateException if the change is not committed and should be rejected. Any other exception signals the something wrong happened but the change is committed.
        Specified by:
        publish in interface Discovery

      • stats

        public DiscoveryStats stats()
        Specified by:
        stats in interface Discovery
        Returns:
        stats about the discovery
